text: Sigfrid Mattsson, born 19 September 1917, dead 27 August 2009, was a Swedish cross-country skier. He competed for Skarpn√§cks IF in club competitions. In 1952, he won the Vasaloppet event. == References == Category:1917 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Swedish skiers
